title: Emmerdale fans convinced Nate isn't Cain's son as they 'rumble' new Dingle twist
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale aired a major twist on Tuesday night as Nate Robinson revealed who he really is, claiming to be the secret son of Cain Dingle.

The two men were embroiled in a showdown after Cain rumbled the character's affair with his wife Moira Dingle.

But what he didn't see coming was the bombshell that Nate' real name was Nathaniel, and that he's his secret son.

There was even more confusion when Faith Dingle, Cain's mother, pulled a pretty alarmed face when she discovered something in Nate's caravan.

Now, viewers have predicted an even bigger twist is on the cards ahead of the identity of his mother being confirmed on-screen - and they think they've rumbled something even more shocking.

(Image: ITV)

Some fans think he isn't actually Cain's child, but might have been led to believe this is the case.

In a huge claim, it's been suggested Cain's mother Faith might in fact be Nate's parent amid claims of the character making an exit.

Actress Sally Dexter recently told Mirror Online that she would have to briefly leave the Dales ones the news came out , with it affecting her as well as Cain and Moira.

(Image: ITV)

This has fueled suspicion from some fans that she could be Nate's mother, and Cain is his brother not his dad.

One fan said: "Nate will not actually be Cain’s son!!! Come on, it’s far too predictable and obvious. He might believe Cain is his dad but he won’t be. Faith is his mum, that’s why she looked so horrified in the caravan, she found something."

Another agreed: "BUT is Nate Cains son or does he just think he is? This could all be back to front....."

(Image: ITV)

A third added: "I think Nate believes he’s Cain’s son but he might actually be Faith’s. Her face at the end pretty much revealed something much darker."

So could Faith know more than she's let on about Nathaniel, or could she be his mum?

Viewers will have to stay tuned ahead of explosive scenes on the lake between Nate, Cain and Moira as the truth is revealed.

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV, with an extra episode at 8pm on Thursdays.
description: Emmerdale viewers think Nate Robinson's claims he's the son of Cain Dingle could be about to take a major turn
